header.locationDescription: This location does not offer mail forwarding

overview.heading: Lincoln Virtual Office
overview.body: Secure a prestigious business address in Lincoln, Nebraska, without the need for a physical office space. With Opus VO, you can position your business at the heart of Lincoln’s dynamic business landscape while keeping your budget intact. Our modern conference rooms are at your disposal for essential meetings and presentations.  When you choose Opus VO’s virtual office in Lincoln, you also gain access to a professional live receptionist who seamlessly integrates into your team. We ensure that each client interaction reflects your unique brand identity. Delegate routine administrative tasks to us, allowing you to focus on your core business objectives.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Lincoln, Nebraska even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Lincoln. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Nebraska.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Lincoln virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Lincoln?
sections.body: Lincoln is more than just the capital of Nebraska; it’s a thriving business center with opportunities in various sectors, including education, healthcare, and technology. Having a Lincoln address grants you access to valuable networking events and industry connections.  Opting for Opus VO for your virtual office in Lincoln is more than a practical choice; it’s a strategic advantage. Are you ready to elevate your business? Discover our exceptional virtual office solutions today.  Opus VO, Lincoln @ 151 N. 8th Street, Lincoln, NE 68508
